# m-nav-pane



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property           | Attribute    | Description                    | Type                  | Default      |
| ------------------ | ------------ | ------------------------------ | --------------------- | ------------ |
| `isActive`         | `is-active`  | Is the current active nav-pane | `boolean`             | `false`      |
| `mId` _(required)_ | `m-id`       | Id of the nav-pane             | `string`              | `undefined`  |
| `mTabindex`        | `m-tabindex` | Tab Index of the nav-pane      | `number \| undefined` | `0`          |
| `role`             | `role`       | Role of the nav-pane           | `string`              | `'tabpanel'` |
